                                0x4692ab01ba0dbd42adf3d191c48ac5d1
                            End
                        End
                        Begin ToggleButton
                            OverlapFlags =87
                            Left =454
                            Top =3346
                            Width =1304
                            Height =284
                            OptionValue =3
                            Name ="Campo58"
                            Caption ="Ambos"
                            GUID = Begin
                                0x2fc89bc6e308a04ea0a2d20c39795c68
                            End
                        End
                        Begin ToggleButton
                            OverlapFlags =87
                            Left =454
                            Top =3686
                            Width =1304
                            Height =284
                            OptionValue =4
                            Name ="Campo59"
                            Caption ="Linea B."
                            GUID = Begin
                                0x09e4512bf031ba4eb47b8a18b0242780
                            End
                        End
                        Begin ToggleButton
                            OverlapFlags =87
                            Left =454
                            Top =4026
                            Width =1304
                            Height =284
                            OptionValue =5
                            Name ="Campo60"
                            Caption ="T. de C."
                            GUID = Begin
                                0x44b41c7108105846bb2c50e793fa68d5
                            End
                        End
                    End
                End
                Begin CommandButton
                    OverlapFlags =85
                    Left =7596
                    Top =6009
                    Width =1140
                    Height =465
                    TabIndex =10
                    ForeColor =255
                    Name ="B_term_pago"
                    Caption ="Terminar"
                    OnClick ="[Event Procedure]"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0xfb170032b2fb6745ba6122ecb9b7a719
                    End
                End
                Begin TextBox
                    Visible = NotDefault
                    OverlapFlags =85
                    Left =3174
                    Top =113
                    Width =231
                    TabIndex =11
                    Name ="Cred_Sub"
                    ControlSource ="=[Recibos Operaciones].Form!Credencial"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x97059e1ba2a8934dae1103b98162bbf9
                    End
                End
                Begin Subform
                    OverlapFlags =85
                    Left =453
                    Top =4875
                    Width =6345
                    Height =900
                    TabIndex =12
                    Name ="F_Alumnos Sub"
                    SourceObject ="Form.F_Alumnos Sub"
                    LinkChildFields ="Colegiaturas.AlumnoID"
                    LinkMasterFields ="Cred_sub"
                    EventProcPrefix ="F_Alumnos_Sub"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x0500c317247cbc48a95d0656564be4a7
                    End
                End
                Begin TextBox
                    Locked = NotDefault
                    OverlapFlags =85
                    Left =5106
                    Top =113
                    Width =2385
                    ColumnWidth =2130
                    TabIndex =13
                    Name ="Fecha"
                    ControlSource ="Fecha"
                    Format ="Long Date"
                    StatusBarText ="Fecha en que se efectuo la operacion"
                    OnEnter ="=Date()"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0xaf2a31c9e2b60f4f8324dea8e861b9e6
                    End
                    Begin
                        Begin Label
                            OverlapFlags =85
                            Left =3968
                            Top =113
                            Width =678
                            Height =240
                            Name ="Texto17"
                            Caption ="Fecha:"
                            GUID = Begin

                        End
                    End

                Begin CommandButton
                    OverlapFlags =85

                        0xc1757fce4a32844d8597778399a1e343
                    End

                Begin TextBox
                    Locked = NotDefault
                    OverlapFlags =85

                    Name ="Campo67"
                    ControlSource ="Hora"

                    End

                Begin CommandButton
                    OverlapFlags =85

                    Caption ="Cancela Recibo"

            Height =0

End
CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
Option Compare Database   'Usar orden de base de datos en comparaciones de cadenas
Dim T_Coleg As Recordset, T_Art As Recordset, T_Examen As Recordset
Dim F_pagos As Form, T_Rec_Can As Recordset, T_Oper_can As Recordset
Dim T_Rec As Recordset, T_Oper As Recordset
Dim db As Database
Dim x, Llave_Rec

Private Sub B_cancel_recibo_Click()
Dim db As Database, FLogin As Form, TUser As Recordset, Forma As Form
On Error GoTo Err_B_cancel_recibo_Click
    
   Set db = CurrentDb()
   Set Forma = Forms![Pagos Consulta]
   Set FLogin = Forms!login
   Set TUser = db.OpenRecordset("Usuarios")
   TUser.Index = "PrimaryKey"
   TUser.Seek "=", FLogin!UserID
   If Not TUser.NoMatch Then
      If TUser!A_RFC = "N" Then
         MsgBox "El usuario no tiene privilegios de acceso"
         DoCmd.Close
      Else
         If TUser!A_RFC = "C" Then
            Forma.AllowEditing = False
            Forma.DefaultEditing = 3
         End If
      End If
   Else
      MsgBox "El usuario no tiene clave de acceso registrada"
      DoCmd.Close
   End If
   
   If TUser!A_RFC = "M" Then
    x = " "
    x = InputBox("Esta seguro de desear Cancelar el Recibo ? Teclee <S/N>")
    If x = "S" Then
       Set db = CurrentDb()
       Set F_pagos = Forms![Pagos Consulta]
       Set T_Rec_Can = db.OpenRecordset("Recibos Cancelados")
       Set T_Oper_can = db.OpenRecordset("Operaciones Canceladas")
       Set T_Rec = db.OpenRecordset("Recibos")
       Set T_Oper = db.OpenRecordset("Operaciones")
       Llave_Rec = Numero
    
       T_Rec.Index = "Primarykey"
       T_Rec.Seek "=", Llave_Rec
       If Not T_Rec.NoMatch Then
          T_Rec_Can.AddNew
          T_Rec_Can!Numero = T_Rec!Numero
          T_Rec_Can!Fecha = T_Rec!Fecha
          T_Rec_Can!Hora = T_Rec!Hora
          T_Rec_Can!Monto = T_Rec!Monto
          T_Rec_Can!Pago = T_Rec!Pago
          T_Rec_Can!Iva = T_Rec!Iva
          T_Rec_Can!Efectivo = T_Rec!Efectivo
          T_Rec_Can!Cheque = T_Rec!Cheque
          T_Rec_Can!DatosCheque = T_Rec!DatosCheque
          T_Rec_Can!DescuentoGeneral = T_Rec!DescuentoGeneral
          T_Rec_Can!FacturacionNombre = T_Rec!FacturacionNombre
          T_Rec_Can!Facturaciondirec1 = T_Rec!Facturaciondirec1
          T_Rec_Can!Facturaciondirec2 = T_Rec!Facturaciondirec2
          T_Rec_Can!FacturacionRFC = T_Rec!FacturacionRFC
          T_Rec_Can.Update
          T_Rec.Delete
       End If

       T_Oper.Index = "Recibo"
       T_Oper.Seek "=", Llave_Rec
       If Not T_Oper.NoMatch Then
          Do While Llave_Rec = T_Oper!Recibo 'And Not T_Oper.EOF
             T_Oper_can.AddNew
             T_Oper_can!Credencial = T_Oper!Credencial
             T_Oper_can!Operacion = T_Oper!Operacion
             T_Oper_can!Monto = T_Oper!Monto
             T_Oper_can!Recibo = T_Oper!Recibo
             T_Oper_can!Grupo = T_Oper!Grupo
             T_Oper_can!Iva = T_Oper!Iva
             T_Oper_can!cantidad = T_Oper!cantidad
             T_Oper_can!Descuento = T_Oper!Descuento
             T_Oper_can!general = T_Oper!general
             T_Oper_can!neto = T_Oper!neto
             T_Oper_can.Update

             If Left(T_Oper![Operacion], 5) = "Coleg" Then
                Set T_Coleg = db.OpenRecordset("Colegiaturas")
                T_Coleg.Index = "Recibo"
                T_Coleg.Seek "=", Llave_Rec
                If Not T_Coleg.NoMatch Then
                   T_Coleg.Delete
                End If
                T_Coleg.Close
             Else
                If Mid(T_Oper![Operacion], 13, 6) = "Examen" Then
                   T_Examen.Index = "ClaveExamen"
                   T_Examen.Seek "=", RTrim(Left(T_Oper![Operacion], 12))
                   If Not T_Examen.NoMatch Then
                      Do While T_Examen!ClaveExamen = Left(T_Oper![Operacion], 12)
                         If T_Examen!Credencial = T_Oper!Credencial Then
                            T_Examen.Delete
                         End If
                         T_Examen.MoveNext
                         If T_Examen!ClaveExamen <> Left(T_Oper![Operacion], 12) Then
                            Exit Do
                         End If
                      Loop
                   End If
                   T_Examen.Close
                Else
                   Set T_Art = db.OpenRecordset("Articulos")
                   T_Art.Index = "Descripcion"
                   T_Art.Seek "=", T_Oper!Operacion
                   If Not T_Art.NoMatch Then
                      Select Case T_Art!Grupo
                          Case Is = "Artc.Promocionales"
                               T_Art.Edit
                               T_Art!Stock = T_Art!Stock + T_Oper!cantidad
                               T_Art.Update
                          Case Is = "BOLETOS JOC"
                               T_Art.Edit
                               T_Art!Stock = T_Art!Stock + T_Oper!cantidad
                               T_Art.Update
                          Case Is = "Materiales"
                               T_Art.Edit
                               T_Art!Stock = T_Art!Stock + T_Oper!cantidad
                               T_Art.Update
                          Case Is = "Mtodos"
                               T_Art.Edit
                               T_Art!Stock = T_Art!Stock + T_Oper!cantidad
                               T_Art.Update
                          Case Is = "Boletos de Concierto"
                               T_Art.Edit
                               T_Art!Stock = T_Art!Stock + T_Oper!cantidad
                               T_Art.Update
                      End Select
                   End If
                   T_Art.Close
                End If
             End If

             T_Oper.Delete
             T_Oper.MoveNext
             If T_Oper.EOF Then
                Exit Do
             Else
                If T_Oper!Recibo <> Llave_Rec Then
                   Exit Do
                End If
             End If

          Loop
       End If
    

       Beep
       MsgBox "Recibo Cancelado"
       DoCmd.GoToControl "Numero"
       DoCmd.Requery
    End If
   End If

Exit_B_cancel_recibo_Click:
    Exit Sub

Err_B_cancel_recibo_Click:
    MsgBox Error$
    Resume Exit_B_cancel_recibo_Click
    
End Sub

Private Sub B_term_pago_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_B_term_pago_Click


    DoCmd.Close

Exit_B_term_pago_Click:
    Exit Sub

Err_B_term_pago_Click:
    MsgBox Error$
    Resume Exit_B_term_pago_Click
    
End Sub

Private Sub Botn61_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_Botn61_Click


    DoCmd.DoMenuItem A_FORMBAR, A_EDITMENU, 10, , A_MENU_VER20

Exit_Botn61_Click:
    Exit Sub

Err_Botn61_Click:
    MsgBox Error$
    Resume Exit_Botn61_Click
    
End Sub

Private Sub Botn66_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_Botn66_Click


    DoCmd.DoMenuItem A_FORMBAR, A_EDITMENU, 10, , A_MENU_VER20

Exit_Botn66_Click:
    Exit Sub

Err_Botn66_Click:
    MsgBox Error$
    Resume Exit_Botn66_Click
    
End Sub

Private Sub Botn70_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_Botn70_Click


    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , A_NEWREC

Exit_Botn70_Click:
    Exit Sub

Err_Botn70_Click:
    MsgBox Error$
    Resume Exit_Botn70_Click
    
End Sub

Private Sub Form_Open(Cancel As Integer)
Dim db As Database, FLogin As Form, TUser As Recordset, Forma As Form
   Set db = CurrentDb()
   Set Forma = Forms![Pagos Consulta]
   Set FLogin = Forms!login
   Set TUser = db.OpenRecordset("Usuarios")
   TUser.Index = "PrimaryKey"
   TUser.Seek "=", FLogin!UserID
   If Not TUser.NoMatch Then
      If IsNull(TUser!C_CB) Or TUser!C_CB = "N" Then
         MsgBox "El usuario no tiene privilegios de acceso"
         DoCmd.CancelEvent
      Else
         If TUser!C_CB = "C" Then
            Forma.AllowEditing = False
            Forma.DefaultEditing = 3
            [B_cancel_recibo].Enabled = False
         End If
      End If
   Else
      MsgBox "El usuario no tiene clave de acceso registrada"
      DoCmd.CancelEvent
   End If

End Sub

Private Sub Comando81_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_Comando81_Click

    Dim stDocName As String

    stDocName = "Recibos"
    DoCmd.OpenReport stDocName, acPreview

Exit_Comando81_Click:
    Exit Sub

Err_Comando81_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_Comando81_Click
    
End Sub
